title: 92/344/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 June 1992 approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs submitted by Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 9 June 1992
approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in  poultry and hatching eggs submitted by Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(92/344/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan submitted by Greece for the  approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs  is hereby approved.
Greece shall bring into force by 15 June 1992 the laws, regulations  and administrative provisions for implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to Greece.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 June 1992. For the  Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
